profile:
Sudbury Tile Stylez and Bathroom renovations has been operating in Sudbury since 2012, and in that short period of time has managed to win Trustedpros.ca Tilesetter/Bathroom renovator of the year award four times in it's first four years based on customer reviews.

 

Specializing in Bathroom renovations and Tile installations, your bathroom can be a place of pride in your home. Be it from your personal ensuite, to the powder room for guest, Sudbury Tile Stylez will help you bring your vision to light. There is no type of tile or stone that is not expeienced in installing that will help make your kitchen floor, backsplash, foryer, fireplace, basement or outside area look professionally done.

â€‹

Sudbury Tile Stylez is ran by just one man. No employees. You deal with Don, the owner, who takes great pride in his craftsmanship. With over 17 years experience in this field, 13 of them in the Toronto area, there isn't much Don has not seen or dealt with when it comes to tile and bathrooms. It is understood at Sudbury Tile Stylez, that renovations can be stressful, and is why Don takes on one job at a time. Which means he is at your home from start to finish of your project. Take comfort in knowing that your home is not being set aside while another job is also being worked on. Your time and hard earned money is respected. Being a homeowner, Don knows what it is to invest in your future.

 

Sudbury Tile Stylez is fully insured. All work is insured from the plumbing to the last screw installed, your home is covered. A client and contractor agreement contract is signed before the start of each job, and a copy of an insurance binder is provided for you the client.

All safety standards are met without exception. Feeling your home is safe, is a great feeling!!

 

Thank you for taking the time to consider Sudbury Tile Stylez for your Bathroom Renovation, and or Tile needs!
